PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-02782011-03-03,  OLD INAC,  ,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectSiksika Nation Bassano Dam Settlement Agreement
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development to execute the Siksika Nation Bassano Dam SETTLEMENT AGREEMENT amongst Canada, the Siksika Nation, the Eastern Irrigation District and the province of Alberta for the purpose of compensating the Siksika Nation for its specific claim with respect to the illegal disposition of reserve lands to the Canadian Pacific Railway.
AttachmentsAttachment
